name: iterall
description: Minimal zero-dependency utilities for using JavaScript Iterables in all environments.
author: Lee Byron <lee@leebyron.com> (http://leebyron.com/)

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run flow && npm run testonly && npm run docs
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint-check && npm run build && npm run flow && npm run testonly && npm run docs-check
scripts.docs-check: if [ "$(documentation readme index.mjs --parse-extension mjs -ds API | grep -vF 'up to date')" ]; then echo 'Must run: npm run docs'; exit 1; fi;
scripts.travis: npm run test-ci && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test-ci && (cd dist && npm publish) && exit 3
